shaderCode: vec2 p=(FC.xy*2.-r)/min(r.x,r.y);vec3 camPos=vec3(0.,0.,-3.);vec3 rd=normalize(vec3(p,1.5));mat3 rotY=rotate3D(t*slider_rotationSpeed,vec3(0.,1.,0.));vec3 spherePos=vec3(0.);float radius=1.0;vec3 lDir=normalize(vec3(sin(t*0.2),0.2,cos(t*0.2)));float b=dot(-camPos,rd);float c=dot(camPos,camPos)-radius*radius;float h=b*b-c;if(h<0.){o=vec4(0.,0.,0.,1.);vec3 starDir=rd;float stars=pow(fract(sin(dot(starDir,vec3(12.9898,78.233,45.5432)))*43758.5453),200.)*slider_starDensity;o.rgb+=vec3(stars)*vec3(0.8,0.9,1.0);return;}float dist=-b-sqrt(h);vec3 hit=camPos+rd*dist;vec3 n=normalize(hit);vec3 localHit=transpose(rotY)*n;float u=0.5+atan(localHit.z,localHit.x)/(2.*3.14159);float v=0.5-asin(localHit.y)/3.14159;float f=0.;mat2 m=mat2(1.6,1.2,-1.2,1.6);vec2 uv=vec2(u,v)*10.;for(int i=0;i<4;i++){f+=sin(uv.x+sin(uv.y))*0.5/pow(2.,float(i));uv=m*uv;}f=0.5+0.5*f;float ocean=smoothstep(0.4,0.41,f);vec3 col=mix(vec3(0.0,0.1,0.5)*slider_oceanBrightness,vec3(0.1,0.3,0.1)*slider_landBrightness,ocean);col=mix(col,vec3(0.5,0.4,0.3),smoothstep(0.6,0.8,f));float clouds=0.;uv=vec2(u+t*0.02,v)*12.;for(int i=0;i<5;i++){clouds+=sin(uv.x+t*0.1+cos(uv.y))*0.5/pow(2.,float(i));uv=m*uv;}clouds=smoothstep(0.4,0.7,clouds);col=mix(col,vec3(1.),clouds*slider_cloudOpacity);float diff=max(0.,dot(n,lDir));float spec=pow(max(0.,dot(reflect(lDir,n),rd)),20.)*(1.-ocean)*(1.-clouds)*0.5;col=col*diff+spec;float fresnel=pow(1.-max(0.,dot(n,-rd)),3.);col+=vec3(0.5,0.4,1.0)*fresnel*0.8*slider_atmosphere;o=vec4(col,1.0);

sliders.name: Rotation Speed
sliders.description: Controls how fast the Earth rotates.

sliders.name: Cloud Opacity
sliders.description: Adjusts the density and visibility of the cloud layer.

sliders.description: Adjusts the brightness/color intensity of the water.
